bug.author: chenhuims
bug.summary: [ASK] Include model training time in examples
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h3>Description</denchmark-h>
Add information about estimated running time in "Model training" cell and mention that user could reduce the number of iterations to speed up the model training. <denchmark-h:h3>How do we replicate the bug?</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-h:h3>Expected behavior (i.e. solution)</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-h:h3>Other Comments</denchmark-h>

comments.comment: Closing this issue as we have added %%time in the notebook cells where we want to collect running time information.
